definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Tens of thousands of flag-waving activists called for early elections.
sentences.chinese: 數以萬計揮舞着國旗的積極分子要求提早進行選舉。

sentences.english: Among the vast numbers of Party and League members the activists and middle elements are rising to give battle .
sentences.chinese: 廣大黨團員中的積極分子及中間羣衆起而對抗。

sentences.english: The activists want the king to surrender his right to appoint the prime minister and cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 這些積極分子希望國王交出權利，任命總理和內閣。

sentences.english: A group of like-minded single-issue activists.
sentences.chinese: 單談某一問題的積極分子集團。

sentences.english: Area English science and technology competition second prize, school study activist, outstanding organization head.
sentences.chinese: 區英語科技競賽二等獎，校學習積極分子，優秀社長。
